underlying_goal: Select a baseline trusted monitor, adapt it for Q&A tasks, and document its use in the project.
primary_success: Adapting the Anthropic monitor prompt to be more suitable for Q&A tasks, improving the relevance of the tool for the user's specific use case.
brief_summary: The user wanted to select a baseline trusted monitor. After identifying that existing monitors were too agent-specific, Claude adapted the Anthropic monitor for Q&A tasks by creating a new config with improved language. Claude then fully integrated this new monitor by updating the main project `CLAUDE.md`, the method specification `trusted-monitoring.md`, and the supporting Python script.
